website_summaries.verdict: Slim, sleek, and light, it's a contemporary iPhone that gives you the basics at an affordable price.
pros: One of the lightest iPhones ever made still feels safe to hold in your hand or pocket
64 GB is enough to handle photos and music
cons: Extremely large photo music and app collections will soon reach their limits with a limited amount of space

customer_reviews.title: A return to form.
customer_reviews.text: Imagine the guts of an iPhone 11 smashed into the chassis of your favorite iPhone 5; if that sounds appealing, then this is the phone for you. Personally I loved having a non-phablet phone with this amount of power and speed. The camera is great for the price range, and call quality is also excellent. The one drawback is a shorter battery life than what I am used to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best iPhone for the price
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 7 took a crap on me. I was done with sprint. I moved over to cricket and picked up this phone instead. I was a little pissed that it’s more expensive here on amazon than it is on crickets website but I needed the phone ASAP so I guess I can’t complain too hard about that. The quality of the camera is great. Fits iPhone 7 and 8 cases too. Very pleased with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Coronado

customer_reviews.title: Great product, service & super easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: I've used iPhones since the 5, so I'm not new to iPhones, but this is the first time I have not gone to a store and had someone setup the phone for me. It was super-simple. Insert the SIM, power up the phone and follow the prompts on-screen. No hiccups, no glitches. Easy! Cricket sent a text with a link to set up the phone number. Also very easy - click the link and follow the on-screen prompts. Nice phone from Apple! Great value and service from Cricket! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CameraUser19403

customer_reviews.title: iPhone SE + Cricket Wireless Service
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING EXPERIENCE. With Prime phone and SIM card kit were here in 1 day. All I had to do was pop in the SIM card, walk through the iPhone set up guide and then go to my text messages and activated a new number (you also have the option to port your number form another carrier). Process took a total of 10 min to set up iPhone and activate service. The activation was the easiest part! $55 for unlimited everything and the phone worked right away!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Carpp

customer_reviews.title: Iphone se 2020 is a Great phone coming from a iphone 7 and Cricket wireless is Great too👍
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping 👍 got it all set up and cricket wireless ported my number with in less than a minute 👌 Had the iphone 7 and the new iPhone se 2020 is way better😎
customer_reviews.author: Donald Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Its a good phone its amost the same as the original iphone SE except bigger and less widthy. Decent sized screen beautiful packaging and the phone itself is beautiful as well. Excellent price compared to how much new iphones usaully cost when they first come out.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just the first day but I absolutely love it !
customer_reviews.author: jakayla

customer_reviews.title: Could not keep my current number
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when buying this product because it is locked. I wanted to keep my current phone number, but could not do it with this plan - even though I already have cricket service and love it. I ended up returning the phone and just bought a new one from the apple store. It cost more, obviously. Too bad because this would have been a great deal - but who wants to change their phone number when it is attached to so much info we use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: maybeth

customer_reviews.title: n/a
customer_reviews.text: Phone is fine except the volume is very low. Have to use speaker phone to talk
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Found a way to buy the phone without the carrier subscription!
customer_reviews.text: Once you add the phone to cart, remove the carrier subscription from cart and you can just get the phone if you’re already subscribed to cricket. (First few hours of owning phone it’s amazing!)
customer_reviews.author: Donavan Ford

customer_reviews.title: Dumbphones
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine but I really hate "smartphones" just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Mjeyes

customer_reviews.title: Problems already
customer_reviews.text: This phone is the best value for an ios 13 phone, but after two weeks I already can't sign in with my fingerprint. I press and press, but end up having to type in the passcode.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: It never read my fingers
customer_reviews.text: Never, no even once. I have reset it though best buy and AT&T 3 times in the last 2 weeks after the purchase, jut want it to read mine, but never succeed. Just another bad Apple
customer_reviews.author: Jane

product_meta.title: New Apple iPhone SE (64GB, (Product) RED) [Locked] + Cricket Wireless Plan
